Bash(python -c "
import paramiko

# Connect to Pi and add Mac''s public key
pi = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
pi.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
pi.connect\(''100.71.124.50'', username=''pk'', key_filename=''C:/Users/prest/.ssh/id_ed25519''\)

mac_pubkey = ''ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIGg2wwkzwtsbYJHpPyu+M3TChzXpkPIWYzAnraEnfeSl mac-to-windows''

# Check if key already exists
stdin, stdout, stderr = pi.exec_command\(''grep -c ""mac-to-windows"" ~/.ssh/authorized_keys 2>/dev/null || echo 0''\)
count = stdout.read\(\).decode\(\).strip\(\)
if count == ''0'':
    stdin, stdout, stderr = pi.exec_command\(f''echo ""{mac_pubkey}"" >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys && chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys''\)
    stdout.read\(\)
    print\(''Mac key added to Pi authorized_keys''\)
else:
    print\(''Mac key already present on Pi''\)

pi.close\(\)

# Connect to Mac and add Pi''s host key to known_hosts
mac = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
mac.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
mac.connect\(''100.76.176.119'', username=''k'', key_filename=''C:/Users/prest/.ssh/id_ed25519''\)

stdin, stdout, stderr = mac.exec_command\(''ssh-keyscan -H 100.71.124.50 >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null && echo ""Pi host key added to Mac""''\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(\).strip\(\)\)

mac.close\(\)
print\(''Done''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import paramiko

pi = paramiko.SSHClient\(\)
pi.set_missing_host_key_policy\(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy\(\)\)
pi.connect\(''100.71.124.50'', username=''pk'', key_filename=''C:/Users/prest/.ssh/id_ed25519''\)

# Write clean authorized_keys with all three keys
keys = ''''''ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIObLSxBAG3EUiQ5vVcdsd5kgJW8wxEE85LdkraVgEIoW windows-to-mac
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIEgSnhJGnKxTQUTq/G30DtHSgmWw8vFLydENbUj5VMSi pi-to-mac
ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIGg2wwkzwtsbYJHpPyu+M3TChzXpkPIWYzAnraEnfeSl mac-to-pi
''''''

sftp = pi.open_sftp\(\)
with sftp.open\(''/home/pk/.ssh/authorized_keys'', ''w''\) as f:
    f.write\(keys\)
sftp.close\(\)

# Fix permissions
stdin, stdout, stderr = pi.exec_command\(''chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys && cat ~/.ssh/authorized_keys''\)
print\(stdout.read\(\).decode\(\)\)

pi.close\(\)
print\(''Authorized keys cleaned up''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import os
path = r''C:\\ProgramData\\ssh\\administrators_authorized_keys''
pi_key = ''ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIEgSnhJGnKxTQUTq/G30DtHSgmWw8vFLydENbUj5VMSi pi-to-windows''
mac_key = ''ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIGg2wwkzwtsbYJHpPyu+M3TChzXpkPIWYzAnraEnfeSl mac-to-windows''

try:
    with open\(path, ''r''\) as f:
        existing = f.read\(\)
    print\(f''Current contents: {repr\(existing\)}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Read error: {e}''\)
    existing = ''''

try:
    with open\(path, ''a''\) as f:
        if pi_key not in existing:
            f.write\(pi_key + ''\\n''\)
            print\(''Pi key appended''\)
        else:
            print\(''Pi key already present''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Write error: {e}''\)
")
